markdownRemark.html: Situated only 5 kms from El Puerto de Santa Mariacute, on the road to Rota. The golf course is excellent. It has three courses of 18 holes and another of 9 holes par three. An impressive driving range and everything very well taken care of. It is a completely flat course and there is no need for a buggy to play.

frontmatter.title: Costa Ballena Ocean Golf Club
frontmatter.description: Costa Ballena Ocean Golf Club - Situated only 5 kms from El Puerto de Santa Maria, on the road  to Rota. The golf course is excellent. It has three courses of 18 holes and another of 9 holes par three. An impressive driving range and everything very well taken care of. It is a completely flat course and there is no need for a buggy to play.
frontmatter.address: C/ Chipiona, El Puerto de Santa María, Km. 5, 11520 Rota (Cádiz), Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 59.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 59.00 euros
